Uses of Package
com.stormpath.sdk.saml

  • Packages that use com.stormpath.sdk.saml 
    Package Description
    com.stormpath.sdk.application  
    com.stormpath.sdk.provider.saml  
    com.stormpath.sdk.saml  
    com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.mvc  
    com.stormpath.spring.boot.autoconfigure  
    com.stormpath.spring.config  
    com.stormpath.spring.security.provider  
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.saml used by com.stormpath.sdk.application 
    Class and Description
    SamlCallbackHandler
    Handles HTTP replies sent from your SAML Identity Provider to your application's callbackUri, for example, https://awesomeapp.com/userHome, and returns an AccountResult.
    SamlIdpUrlBuilder
    A Builder design pattern used to construct a URL you can use to redirect application users to a SAML authentication site (Identity Provider or IdP) for performing common user identity functionality.
    SamlPolicy
    A SamlPolicy represents an Application's SAML-specific configuration.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.saml used by com.stormpath.sdk.provider.saml 
    Class and Description
    AttributeStatementMappingRules
    An ordered Set of all AttributeStatementMappingRules that indicate how SAML Attribute Statements should populate one or more Stormpath Account field values after a successful SAML login.
    SamlServiceProviderMetadata
    The (read-only) Service Provider metadata that can be used to register an application (aka 'Service Provider) with a SAML Identity Provider.
  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.saml used by com.stormpath.sdk.saml 
    Class and Description
    AssertionConsumerServicePostEndpoint
    The Stormpath endpoint that will process SAML Assertions sent by the SAML Identity Provider for a specific Stormpath Directory.
    AttributeStatementMappingRule
    A rule that indicates how a SAML Attribute Statement should populate one or more Stormpath Account field values.
    AttributeStatementMappingRuleBuilder
    A Builder to construct AttributeStatementMappingRule resources.
    AttributeStatementMappingRules
    An ordered Set of all AttributeStatementMappingRules that indicate how SAML Attribute Statements should populate one or more Stormpath Account field values after a successful SAML login.
    AttributeStatementMappingRulesBuilder
    A Builder to construct AttributeStatementMappingRules resources.
    InvalidSamlTokenException 
    SamlCallbackHandler
    Handles HTTP replies sent from your SAML Identity Provider to your application's callbackUri, for example, https://awesomeapp.com/userHome, and returns an AccountResult.
    SamlException 
    SamlIdpUrlBuilder
    A Builder design pattern used to construct a URL you can use to redirect application users to a SAML authentication site (Identity Provider or IdP) for performing common user identity functionality.
    SamlResultListener
    Listener interface to get notifications about effective operations of the SAML IdP invocation: authentication or logout.
    SamlServiceProvider
    A SamlServiceProvider instance represents the information necessary to redirect an end-user to login at a SAML Identity Provider.
    SamlSessionTimeoutException 
    SsoInitiationEndpoint

    SamlIdpUrlBuilder
    A Builder design pattern used to construct a URL you can use to redirect application users to a SAML authentication site (Identity Provider or IdP) for performing common user identity functionality.
